trans-unit.source:
Attribute: . id="myTemplate". Optional attribute but it is requested when using reference to this object. The reference will be "myTemplate".
The following tags are allowed inside the template tag.
Defines the root directory for the template. Attribute: . dir="PATH_site". Sets the root directory. Any defined php constant, in particular all TYPO3 path constants, will be interpreted.
Loads the template file name. Attribute: . file="typo3conf/ext/sav_jpgraph/templates/polarex0.xml".
Defines the root directory for the copy of the image. Attribute: . dir="PATH_site". Sets the root directory. Any defined php constant, in particular all TYPO3 path constants, will be interpreted.

Copies the resulting image in a given file. Attributes: . ref="file#1". Sets the root directory. A string is expected, in general it is the reference to a file. . file="fileadmin/test.png". Destination file.
